Ebml (BCB)

Download

  • Download http://dl.matroska.org/downloads/libebml/libebml-0.7.5.tar.bz2

Adaptation

  • Add %SOURCE_HOME%/src/platform/win32/*.h in %SOURCE_HOME%/ebml/

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/make/mingw32/libebml.dev)
  • Add (%SOURCE_HOME%/src/platform/win32/): All .cpp files

Project Options

  • Directories, include : add %SOURCE_HOME%/

Compile

  • Ctrl+F9

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/Ebml to Shared/Include/Ebml
  • Copy %Your_Project_Name%.a to Shared/Library/GCC_MinGW32/Ebml.a
